job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <strong>Software Engineer<br><br>Partner Software - Athens, GA<br><br></strong>Partner Software is seeking a Mid-Level Full Stack Developer/Engineer for the Map Platform team. We are looking for a motivated developer who wants to own the design and development of an application used to process, analyze, and display geographic data.<br><br>If you have a desire to take lead on a project and build simple yet powerful programs, you will be a great fit. You will also enjoy the benefits of working in a small and fast paced business that is backed with the necessary resources to enhance your career and have your efforts play a key role in the success of the company.<br><br><strong><u>What We Are Looking For<br></u></strong><ul><li>2+ years experience in Java development</li><li>Excellent analytical and problem solving skills</li><li>Strong communication skills and the ability to work closely with others</li><li>Demonstrated ability to work on small, focused teams<br></li></ul><strong><u>What Will Help You Stand Out<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience with GIS </li><li>Experience with code versioning tools and process</li></ul>
